pr_title: Add ability to directly specify endpoints in tests

timeline.bodyText: Does this really need to be volatile?
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: no, the original approach I took with this had it being set from a buildstep, but that was compex and would not work in native, so I abandoned the approach.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas

timeline.message:
Add ability to directly specify endpoints in tests

This makes it easy to specify eactly what endpoint is being
tested.
